title: Shirayuki Hime no Densetsu (The Legend of Snow White)
synopsis: Snow White was a very happy princess, until the day her stepmother, the Queen Christelle, finally reveals her personality and wants to kill the girl. Snow White flees from the castle and got lost in the woods, where she meets seven dwarfs.
voices: ['Amano, Yuri', 'Naka, Hiroshi', 'Iwanaga, Tetsuya', 'Koyasu, Takehito', 'Yokoo, Mari', 'Yamaguchi, Kappei', 'Ootani, Ikue']
staff: [['Okajima, Kunitoshi', ['Director', ' Episode Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Asada, Yuuji', ['Episode Director']], ['Inoue, Osamu', ['Episode Director']], ['Sakurai, Masaaki', ['Script']]]
